name: x-attack-6
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Raises the target’s Attack by six stages. This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
short_effect: Raises Attack by six stages in battle. Wonder Launcher only.

flavor_text.black-white: It raises the Attack stat of a Pokémon in battle immensely. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: It raises the Attack stat of a Pokémon in battle immensely. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
